item.title: .NET developer with Coldfusion(MUST HAVE BOTH) (san jose north)
item.description:
Directions:
1. Please contact daniel.chin@rht.com for all responses
2. Include your updated resume in Word Format
3. Please list your work authorization in the U.S.

Location: San Jose
Duration: up to 3-6 months

Solid marketing company is looking for a Web Developer with .NET and Coldfusion experience. The ideal candidate will be versatile and be able to work in a fast paced environment.

Candidate must have the following:
- Coldfusion
- CMS experience (ideally Sharepoint)
- Web Development with C# and VB.NET
- SQL Server 2000 and 2005
- Good verbal communication
- Ability to work within a team

Daniel Chin
Account Executive
Robert Half Technology
Daniel.Chin@rht.com
www.RHT.com
item.dc:title: .NET developer with Coldfusion(MUST HAVE BOTH) (san jose north)
